meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one hundredth of a litre.
meanings.sent1: I poured two centilitres of water into the glass.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for fifty centilitres of milk.
meanings.sent3: The tiny fairy needed just a few centilitres of dew to make her potion.
meanings.sent4: His heart was filled with a hundred centilitres of love for her.
meanings.sent5: The scientist measured the exact centilitres of liquid in the beaker.
